author: Monica Alba
title: Pro-Trump Super PAC commits over $25 million for ads in Florida, North Carolina
description: The official pro-Trump Super PAC, America First Action, committed Thursday to additional broadcast spending of over $25 million in two key presidential battleground states for the fall ahead of Election Day.
content:
WASHINGTON The official pro-Trump Super PAC, America First Action, committed Thursday to additional broadcast spending of over $25 million in two key presidential battleground states for the fall ahead of Election Day.
